attributes.action: Can you to justify the closure of the pharmacy in Albrighton, Shropshire. WV7.
attributes.additional_details: This long established independent pharmacy serves a population of between 8 & 10,000, comprising all ages & life styles with a large number of elderly. The effect of the proposed closure would mean that the nearest alternative requiring a round trip of 1/2 Hours by public transport.
attributes.background: The government is transforming systems to deliver efficiency savings to ensure community pharmacies meet patient expectations & technology developments. promoting use of online, & click & collect or home delivery models, helping patients get prescriptions in ways that fit their lifestyle.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to ask for a specific action from the Government or Parliament. 

You might like to sign this petition, which calls on the Government not to cut pharmacy funding, instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/116943
